KnowWE-plugin-d3web

Contains all javascript functions concerning the KnowWE plugin d3web.

Summary
KnowWE-plugin-d3webContains all javascript functions concerning the KnowWE plugin d3web.
KNOWWE.plugin.d3webThe KNOWWE plugin d3web namespace.
KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.actionssome core actions of the D3Web plugin for KNOWWE.
Functions
initSome function that are executed on page load.
doKbGeneratingAdds a specified knowledgebase in jar format.
doTiRexToXCL
highlightXCLRelation
highlightRule
highlightNodeHighlights an DOM node in the current wiki page.
KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.dialogThe KNOWWE HTMLDialog plugin namespace.
Variables
bttn_nameThe name of the add/remove dialog button in the page actions tops menue.
qContainerStatesStores the state of visibility of each qcontainer in the dialog.
Functions
initCreates an button in the top actions menu in the WIKI.
initActionAdds some events to the HTMLDialog.
insertInserts the HTMLDialog into an article page.
getQContainerVisibilityStateStores the display status of each qcontainer element of the HTMLDialog.
removeRemoves the HTMLDialog from the article and changes the HTMLDialog menu button to its default.
showElementSets an element of the HTMLDialog visible to the user.
refreshedShows the HTMLDialog after a page refresh.
answerClickedStores the user selected answer of the HTMLDialog.
numInputHandles input fields in the HTMLDialog.
sendStores the user input as single finding through an AJAX request.
saveAsXCLStores the selected findings in the HTMLDialog as an XCLRealtion.
KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.adminconsoleThe KNOWWE plugin admin console.
Functions
initAdds events to the buttons in the admin console.
doReInit
doParseWeb
doSumAll
KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.semanticThe namespace of the semantic things in KNOWWE.
Variables
sTimerStores an timer object.
Functions
initInitializes the semantic popups.
overlayActionsContains all actions that can occur in an question overlay element.
handleFormHandles the selection of checkboxes.
handleNumHandles the input in an HTMLInput element
handleOCHandles the selection within an one choice question.
sendSends the user selection and stores it.
showOverlayQuestionGets the data that is shown as an overlay over the current question.
KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.solutionstateThe solutionstate namespace.
initInitializes the solutionstate functionality.
updateSolutionstateUpdates the solutions in the solutionstate panel.
clearSolutionstateDeletes the established solutions in the solutionstate panel.
showFindingsShows the findings in an extra popup window.
showExplanationShows detail information about an established solution.
showSolutionLogShows detail information about ...
KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.rerenderquestionsheetContains some functions to update the question sheet after the user selected an answer in the dialog or in the question sheet itself.
Functions
updateUpdates the question sheet after the user selected an answer in the pop-up window.
executeExecutes the update question sheet AJAX request
KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.rerendercontentRerenders parts of the article.
Functions
updateNodeUpdates a node.
update
executeSends the rerendercontent AJAX request.
updateForXCLRelationUpdates a XCLRelation.
executeForXCLRelationExecutes the update XCLRelation AJAX request.
sleepForXCLRelation

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web

The KNOWWE plugin d3web namespace.  Initialized empty to ensure existence.

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.actions

some core actions of the D3Web plugin for KNOWWE.

Summary
Functions
initSome function that are executed on page load.
doKbGeneratingAdds a specified knowledgebase in jar format.
doTiRexToXCL
highlightXCLRelation
highlightRule
highlightNodeHighlights an DOM node in the current wiki page.

Functions

init

init : function()

Some function that are executed on page load.  They initialize some core d3web plugin functionality.

doKbGenerating

doKbGenerating : function(event)

Adds a specified knowledgebase in jar format.

Parameters

eventThe event from the create knowledgebase button.

doTiRexToXCL

doTiRexToXCL : function(topicname)

Parameters

topicnameThe name of the page

highlightXCLRelation

highlightXCLRelation : function(event)

Parameters

eventThe event that was triggered from a DOM element.

highlightRule

highlightRule : function(event)

Parameters

eventThe event that was triggered from a DOM element.

highlightNode

highlightNode : function(node,
topic,
depth,
breadth,
event)

Highlights an DOM node in the current wiki page.  You need a span with an id to use this.  There the uniqueMarker is located.  Note: if a node has more than 1 element this function.  Will not work because it cannot foresee how the html-tree is build.

See Also

<highlighXCLRelation>

Parameters

nodeis the tag that has the marker under it topic -
depthmeans the tag that has the marker as firstchild. breadth -
eventUsed to stop event bubbling.

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.dialog

The KNOWWE HTMLDialog plugin namespace.

Summary
Variables
bttn_nameThe name of the add/remove dialog button in the page actions tops menue.
qContainerStatesStores the state of visibility of each qcontainer in the dialog.
Functions
initCreates an button in the top actions menu in the WIKI.
initActionAdds some events to the HTMLDialog.
insertInserts the HTMLDialog into an article page.
getQContainerVisibilityStateStores the display status of each qcontainer element of the HTMLDialog.
removeRemoves the HTMLDialog from the article and changes the HTMLDialog menu button to its default.
showElementSets an element of the HTMLDialog visible to the user.
refreshedShows the HTMLDialog after a page refresh.
answerClickedStores the user selected answer of the HTMLDialog.
numInputHandles input fields in the HTMLDialog.
sendStores the user input as single finding through an AJAX request.
saveAsXCLStores the selected findings in the HTMLDialog as an XCLRealtion.

Variables

bttn_name

var bttn_name

The name of the add/remove dialog button in the page actions tops menue.

Type

String

qContainerStates

var qContainerStates

Stores the state of visibility of each qcontainer in the dialog.

Type

String

Functions

init

init : function()

Creates an button in the top actions menu in the WIKI.  This button is use to insert an HTMLDialog into the current article.

initAction

initAction : function()

Adds some events to the HTMLDialog.  Without this the Dialog does not respond to any user action.

insert

insert : function(event)

Inserts the HTMLDialog into an article page.  Also changes the HTMLDialog menu button to remove the HTMLDialog when necessary.

Parameters

eventThe event from the page actions top menu.

getQContainerVisibilityState

getQContainerVisibilityState : function()

Stores the display status of each qcontainer element of the HTMLDialog.  Used to restore the view after a refresh occurred.

remove

remove : function()

Removes the HTMLDialog from the article and changes the HTMLDialog menu button to its default.

showElement

showElement : function(event)

Sets an element of the HTMLDialog visible to the user.

Parameters

eventThe qContainer click event.

refreshed

refreshed : function()

Shows the HTMLDialog after a page refresh.  Uses the qContainerStates variable to determine the state of the elements.  The state is recovered according to this.

answerClicked

answerClicked : function(event)

Stores the user selected answer of the HTMLDialog.

Parameters

eventThe user click event on an answer.

numInput

numInput : function(event)

Handles input fields in the HTMLDialog.

Parameters

eventThe event that occurs when the users enters a numeric value into an input field of the dialog.

send

send : function(web,
namespace,
oid,
termName,
params)

Stores the user input as single finding through an AJAX request.

Parameters

web - namespace The name of the article oid - The id of the question termName - The question text params - Some parameter depending on the HTMLInputElement

saveAsXCL

saveAsXCL : function()

Stores the selected findings in the HTMLDialog as an XCLRealtion.  Used as a simple XCLRelation editor.

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.adminconsole

The KNOWWE plugin admin console.

Summary
Functions
initAdds events to the buttons in the admin console.
doReInit
doParseWeb
doSumAll

Functions

init

init : function()

Adds events to the buttons in the admin console.  Without this there is no action in the admin console.

doReInit

doReInit : function()

doParseWeb

doParseWeb : function()

doSumAll

doSumAll : function()

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.semantic

The namespace of the semantic things in KNOWWE.

Summary
Variables
sTimerStores an timer object.
Functions
initInitializes the semantic popups.
overlayActionsContains all actions that can occur in an question overlay element.
handleFormHandles the selection of checkboxes.
handleNumHandles the input in an HTMLInput element
handleOCHandles the selection within an one choice question.
sendSends the user selection and stores it.
showOverlayQuestionGets the data that is shown as an overlay over the current question.

Variables

sTimer

var sTimer

Stores an timer object.  Used to remove the overlay question element after a certain amount of time with no user action.

Type

Object

Functions

init

init : function()

Initializes the semantic popups.  Adds to every question of the questionsheet a popup action.

overlayActions

overlayActions : function()

Contains all actions that can occur in an question overlay element.  Used to initialize the actions after the overlay is created.

handleForm

handleForm : function(e)

Handles the selection of checkboxes.

Parameters

eThe current occurred event.

handleNum

handleNum : function(e)

Handles the input in an HTMLInput element

Parameters

eThe current occurred event

handleOC

handleOC : function(e)

Handles the selection within an one choice question.

Parameters

eThe current occurred event

send

send : function(url,
values)

Sends the user selection and stores it.  Used in the other handleXXX functions to send an AJAX request in order to store the users choice.

Parameters

urlThe URL of the request
valuesThe selected value

showOverlayQuestion

showOverlayQuestion : function(e)

Gets the data that is shown as an overlay over the current question.

Parameters

eThe latest event object

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.solutionstate

The solutionstate namespace.

Summary
initInitializes the solutionstate functionality.
updateSolutionstateUpdates the solutions in the solutionstate panel.
clearSolutionstateDeletes the established solutions in the solutionstate panel.
showFindingsShows the findings in an extra popup window.
showExplanationShows detail information about an established solution.
showSolutionLogShows detail information about ...

init

init : function()

Initializes the solutionstate functionality.  Adds to the buttons the correct action.

updateSolutionstate

updateSolutionstate : function()

Updates the solutions in the solutionstate panel.

clearSolutionstate

clearSolutionstate : function()

Deletes the established solutions in the solutionstate panel.

showFindings

showFindings : function(event)

Shows the findings in an extra popup window.

showExplanation

Shows detail information about an established solution.

showSolutionLog

Shows detail information about ...

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.rerenderquestionsheet

Contains some functions to update the question sheet after the user selected an answer in the dialog or in the question sheet itself.

Summary
Functions
updateUpdates the question sheet after the user selected an answer in the pop-up window.
executeExecutes the update question sheet AJAX request

Functions

update

update : function( )

Updates the question sheet after the user selected an answer in the pop-up window.

execute

execute : function(url,
id)

Executes the update question sheet AJAX request

Parameters

urlThe URL for the AJAX request
idThe id of the DOM Element that should be updated.

KNOWWE.plugin.d3web.rerendercontent

Rerenders parts of the article.

Summary
Functions
updateNodeUpdates a node.
update
executeSends the rerendercontent AJAX request.
updateForXCLRelationUpdates a XCLRelation.
executeForXCLRelationExecutes the update XCLRelation AJAX request.
sleepForXCLRelation

Functions

updateNode

updateNode : function(node,
topic)

Updates a node.

Parameters

nodeThe node that should be updated.
topicThe name of the page that contains the node.

update

update : function()

execute

execute : function(url,
id)

Sends the rerendercontent AJAX request.

Parameters

urlThe URL for the AJAX request.
idThe id of the node that should be updated.

updateForXCLRelation

updateForXCLRelation : function (node,
topic,
depth,
breadth)

Updates a XCLRelation.

Parameters

nodeis the tag that has the marker under it topic -
depthmeans the tag that has the marker as first child. breadth -

executeForXCLRelation

executeForXCLRelation : function(url,
id,
node,
topic,
depth,
breadth)

Executes the update XCLRelation AJAX request.

Parameters

url - id - node - is the tag that has the marker under it topic - depth - means the tag that has the marker as first child. breadth -

sleepForXCLRelation

sleepForXCLRelation : function(node,
topic,
depth,
breadth)

Parameters

nodeis the tag that has the marker under it topic -
depthmeans the tag that has the marker as first child. breadth -
